title: Queer Blues Dance Class – History Month Special
description: After the success of the first LGBTQ Blues Dancing Taster Session, CDC is coming back with a History Month Special! It includes a dance class from 19.30-20.30, a short talk about the awesome queer people that show up in the history of blues and how blues helped to queer white culture and finally a chance to try out your new moves with some music.
